subject: Issue with VAM Rumble Motor
description_text:
Hello!
I am using Simsonn pedals.
Recently, I purchased the VAM Rumble Motor and have been using it with your Simsonn app (latest version).
I’ve encountered the following issues:
* 
In most games, the motors do not work properly—for example, in  LeMans Ultimate . When launching the game, the motor just vibrates nonstop without interruption.
* 
Some settings cannot be adjusted. I move the sliders, change the intensity, strength, and frequency, but the vibration remains unchanged. The functions that cannot be modified are highlighted in red in the image below.
 
That said, I tried using the VAM Rumble Motor with the  Simhub app—and the situation is better there. The same game,  LeMans Ultimate , works fine, and all settings can be adjusted.
I would really like your Simsonn app to work correctly so that I don’t have to rely on third-party applications.


Thanks a lot.
--
Станислав Носов
Отправлено из Почты  Mail

Hi Носов Станислав,  We will check it first and then get back to you.

Hi Носов Станислав,  In SIMSONN Manager test mode, the effect of telemetry intensity settings may not be fully reflected, but it should work properly during actual gameplay. If you are using VAM motors, we recommend avoiding continuous vibration telemetry types and limiting the intensity to 50% or below to prevent motor damage. For VAM Pro, there are no such restrictions.
